section.section:
A designated household may terminate an extended lease at any time by giving written notice to the landlord:
at least 1 month in advance, if less than 12 months remain on the lease; or
at least 3 months in advance, if 12 months or more remain on the lease.
An extended lease for a designated household under this subtitle shall include the termination provisions of this section.

text.section:
The extended tenancy of a designated household ends:
90 days after the last member of the assisted household who lived in the unit on the date of the notice of intent dies or moves from the unit;
on eviction for failure to pay rent or for violation of another material term of the extended lease; or
on voluntary termination by the designated household under subsection (a) of this section.
